title: "Exacerbate My Stress Levels" - Top Five Horror Films
itunes:title: "Exacerbate My Stress Levels" - Top Five Horror Films
description:
It's spooky season Haflings! If you're looking for some October viewing inspiration look no further, as we gather around the fire to discuss some of our favourite Horror films. 
TRIGGER WARNING - This episode contains discussion surrounding eating disorders and sexual assault.

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
